parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (11240060), which is a strong indicator of electoral propaganda, as it's a unique identifier for candidates.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Florin Barbur, a candidate for the REPER party in the Maramureș County parliamentary elections.  The image further reinforces this by displaying his picture and explicitly asking people to vote for him and his party.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. The use of hashtags further suggests an attempt to maximize reach and engagement.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support Florin Barbur and the REPER party in the upcoming parliamentary elections. Phrases like "Votează poziția 10 pe buletinul de vot!" and "Te îndemn să votezi cu încredere partidul REPER" directly aim to influence voting behavior.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>While the post presents some biographical information about the candidate, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic content.  The focus is heavily on promoting the candidate and his party, not on providing balanced information.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post goes beyond expressing a personal opinion; it actively solicits votes for a specific candidate and party. The call to action is explicitly electoral in nature.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2987748928057189</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to a candidate (Florin Barbur), uses visual aids (image) to promote him, targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook campaign, has a clear electoral objective (influencing votes), and goes beyond simple journalistic reporting. The post's timing, close to the election, further strengthens the case for it being electoral propaganda.  The presence of the CMF number is also a key indicator.  There are no counterarguments to suggest this is not electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>FLORIN BARBUR</name>
    <impact>POSITIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>REPER</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Atelierul de internet SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 2987748928057189) cu scop electoral, care promovează candidatul Florin Barbur din partea partidului REPER pentru alegerile parlamentare din Maramureș. Postarea, care a beneficiat de o investiție financiară între 200 și 299 RON, conține imaginea candidatului, îndemnuri explicite la vot ("Votează poziția 10 pe buletinul de vot!", "Te îndemn să votezi cu încredere partidul REPER"), și numărul CMF 11240060, toate acestea având ca efect influențarea votului în favoarea candidatului menționat.  Postarea a avut o estimare a vizualizărilor între 10.000 și 15.000, ajungând la o audiență estimată între 100.000 și 500.000 de persoane.  Contactul Atelierul de internet SRL poate fi realizat la adresa de email andrei@atelieru.ro sau la numărul de telefon +40755080070.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
